# Soviet Land Nehru Award

}}
The Soviet Land Nehru Award was a literary award created in 1965 in India.
The award was created to foster better relations between India and the Soviet Union. The first award recipient was the poet Sumitranandan Pant (1900â€“1977).
The award is named for Soviet Land magazine, which was an Indian magazine published by the Soviet government to promote socialism. TASS published the magazine.
Notable award winners
* Mother Teresa
* Kaifi Azmi
* Satyajit Ray
* Ram Mattegunta
* Harivansh Rai Bachchan
* Firaq Gorakhpuri
* Quratulain Hyder
* Muzaffar Aazim
* Narayan Surve
* Padma Sachdev
* Balraj Sahni
* Subhash Mukhopadhyay
* Shivmangal Singh Suman
* Dr. Ranjeet
* Manmatha Ray (1967)
